description:
We get a closer look at Ekoda-chan`s relationship with Maa-kun through the creative vision of Mochizuki Tomomi  (Ranma 1/2, Code Geass) and Chiba Chiemi (Kirakira ☆ Precure a la Mode, Rozen Maiden).
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Rinshi!! Ekoda-chan: Kantoku to Ekoda-chan Ra no Zadankai - Mochizuki Tomomi x Chiba Chiemi
Rinshi!! Ekoda-chan: The Director and Ekoda-chan`s Naked Chat 4 - Mochizuki Tomomi x Chiba Chiemi
臨死!! 江古田ちゃん 監督と江古田ちゃん裸[ら]の座談会 望月智充 x 千葉千恵巳
